answers.answer: All of your hormones have to be balanced with each other or you won't feel well.Hyperglycemic means that you have too much sugar in your blood; have you been checked for diabetes?  Weight loss is a major symptom of Type I diabetes.  You should ask your doctor to test you for it.What thyroid tests did you have done?  If they only did TSH, that isn't enough; you need also to have Free T3 and Free T4 tested.
